apache.eli5: Apache is like a waiter that brings web pages to people when they ask for them.
apache.boss: Apache is a popular open-source web server used to serve websites and web apps over the internet.
apache.sysadmin: Apache HTTP Server is a modular, open-source web server supporting .htaccess, virtual hosts, and various modules for SSL, caching, and URL rewriting.
apache.use_case: Used to serve PHP websites on a traditional LAMP stack.

litespeed.eli5: LiteSpeed is a faster waiter than Apache who brings your web pages quickly.
litespeed.boss: LiteSpeed is a high-performance commercial web server that improves speed and efficiency over traditional options like Apache.
litespeed.sysadmin: LiteSpeed Web Server is a drop-in Apache replacement offering optimized performance, HTTP/3 support, and advanced caching mechanisms.
litespeed.use_case: Used by hosting providers for faster content delivery and lower server load.
